body.name: ZIKEE Office Seat Cushion with TPE Gel, Enhances Ventilation & Support Memory Foam Cushion for Sciatica, Back, Tailbone Pain Relief, Long Sitting on Office Desk Chairs, Wheelchairs
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 23 hrs 54 mins
features: Breathable Comfort for Long Sitting: This office chair cushion offers premium breathability by adopting innovative honeycomb TPE gel, ventilated holes of memory foam, and air layer fabric. The seat pillow can prevent discomfort caused by heat accumulation after long sitting and is also an ideal choice for summer days.

Enhanced Support & Moderate Softness: The desk chair cushion provides enhanced support and moderate softness through a combination of TPE honeycomb gel and premium memory foam. It supports your lower body comfortably without flatness. The enlarged pressure relief seat cushion (size: 18"x14"x3") provides a wider contact area between your bottom and chair for a more comfortable seating experience.

Ergonomic Pain Relief of Sitting: This tailbone pain relief cushion is designed with a U-shape cutout, which can help relieve tailbone pressure, back and lower back pain, sciatica, and other issues caused by long sitting. The W-shaped design of this butt cushion can promote blood circulation.

Multiple Use: This gel cushion for sitting can transform any hard chair into a comfy seat. It can be used in the office, at home, during travel, in the car, or on a wheelchair. The memory foam seat cushion also can be a thoughtful gift for your family, friends, and colleagues, nobody would refuse a gift of comfort and health.
Safe & Convenient Designs: The cushion for office chair is designed with a non-slip rubber bottom for optimal safety. Machine-washable cover is easy to clean for a refreshing experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good quality and a good product. Does what it is supposed to do.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sit on it...lol

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The gel office seat cushion works just fine. When I sit on it all day, I do not feel like with some of them, that it heats up. It is a comfortable gel pillow to sit on, and really helps my tailbone after some major back surgery. I would say that my only issue with the cushion is that it moves back every time I sit on it, so I have to be very careful how I sit on it. I’ve had it for a few weeks now and find that so far, it has held up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Seems very well made, will know better after a couple of weeks

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the tush
reviews.reviewText: Wish I had gotten one years ago.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a cushy cushion, and in my opinion, while it is comfortable to sit on, it is uncomfortably thick. Be prepared to be noticeably raised up from your normal seating height. Also, the cushion is an odd shape and I had to look at the product page to know which was the front versus back. If you don't mind the thickness, it is a sturdy, well-made and comfortable cushion. I just found it too thick.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a good seat cushion if you have back pain. I have had several surgery’s on my back and neck. I went threw a few seat cushions . This one is a little on the big side and little odd shape from others I have used, but this one is the most supportive and comfortable . Just the right firmness where it helps your lower back and it’s not to hard to be sitting on for hours. I use it to drive mostly. Since it’s a little on the big side it’s perfect for driving . Your not sinking down into the cushion or fidgeting around trying to get comfortable . I can honestly say I have notice when am walking I have less pain in my back and hip. Since I been using this cushion. (Bone taken out of hip) and it’s only been a little over a week since the first time I used this cushion.The cushion made very well not cheap at all. The only thing I would like to have on this pillow is some type of handle or strap. It’s a bit hard to carry for me . Little hands .So yes I like this cushion very much and highly recommend to anyone with lower back pain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Support and Pain Relief: ZIKEE Office Seat Cushion
reviews.reviewText: I'm loving this ZIKEE office seat cushion! I must say it has been a game-changer for my sitting experience. This cushion combines the benefits of TPE gel ventilation and supportive memory foam, providing exceptional comfort and effective pain relief.One of the standout features of this cushion is the TPE gel layer. Its enhanced ventilation keeps me cool and comfortable, even during long hours of sitting. I appreciate how it effectively addresses the discomfort that can arise from sitting for prolonged periods.The build quality of the ZIKEE cushion is exceptional. The materials used are durable and well-made, ensuring longevity. The cushion maintains its shape and support even with daily use. Additionally, the non-slip bottom keeps it securely in place on any office chair, which is a practical feature.I highly recommend the ZIKEE office seat cushion for anyone seeking enhanced comfort and relief during long hours of sitting.
